TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 使用掩码区分正确的和不正确的用户输入。

span.span: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是增强型支持声明性语法来接受或拒绝用户输入的控件。The class is an enhanced control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input. 使用属性，可以指定以下输入而无需在应用程序中编写任何自定义验证逻辑：Using the property, you can specify the following input without writing any custom validation logic in your application: - 所需的输入的字符。Required input characters. - 可选的输入的字符。Optional input characters. - 输入掩码; 中的给定位置在预期的类型例如，一个数字或以字母或字母数字字符。The type of input expected at a given position in the mask; for example, a digit, or an alphabetic or alphanumeric character. - 掩码原义字符或直接在应显示的字符; 例如，电话号码或在价格中的货币符号中的连字符 （-）。Mask literals, or characters that should appear directly in the ; for example, the hyphens (-) in a phone number, or the currency symbol in a price. - 特殊处理的输入字符;例如，若要将字母的字符转换为大写。Special processing for input characters; for example, to convert alphabetic characters to uppercase. 当控件显示在运行时，它表示为一系列的提示字符和可选的文本字符的掩码。When a control is displayed at run time, it represents the mask as a series of prompt characters and optional literal characters. 表示一个必需或可选的输入，每个可编辑的掩码位置会显示与单个的提示字符。Each editable mask position, representing a required or optional input, is shown with a single prompt character. 例如，数字符号 （#） 通常用于作为占位符的数字字符输入。For example, the number sign (#) is often used as a placeholder for a numeric character input. 可以使用属性来指定自定义提示字符。You can use the property to specify a custom prompt character. 属性确定用户能否看到提示字符当控件失去输入焦点。The property determines if the user sees the prompt characters when the control loses input focus. 屏蔽的文本框中输入的用户类型，有效的输入的字符替换以连续方式及其各自的提示字符。As the user types input into the masked text box, valid input characters replace their respective prompt characters in a sequential fashion. 如果用户键入无效的输入的字符，没有替代项会发生，但如果改为发出提示音属性设置为`true`，和引发事件。If the user types an invalid input character, no replacement occurs, but instead a beep is issued if the property is set to `true`, and the event is raised. 可以通过处理此事件来提供您自己自定义错误的逻辑。You can provide your own custom error logic by handing this event. 原义字符在当前插入点时，用户将具有大量选项：When the current insertion point is at a literal character, the user has a number of options: - 如果键入字符而不是提示字符，将自动跳过该文本，并输入的字符将应用于的下一步的可编辑位置表示下一步的提示字符。If a character other than the prompt character is typed, the literal will automatically be skipped and the input character will be applied to the next editable position, represented by the next prompt character. - 如果提示字符的类型和属性为 true 时，输入将覆盖的提示字符和插入点将被移动到掩码中的下一个位置。If the prompt character is typed and the property is true, the input will overtype the prompt character and insertion point will be moved to the next position in the mask. - 由于始终是这种情况，可以使用箭头键导航到之前或之后的位置。As is always the case, the arrow keys can be used to navigate to a previous or subsequent position. 可以使用属性以验证是否在用户输入所有所需的输入。You can use the property to verify whether or not the user has entered all of the required input. 属性将始终检索用户的输入掩码根据格式化和属性。The property will always retrieve the user's input formatted according to the mask and the property. 控件实际上将推迟到所有掩码处理指定类属性。The control actually defers all mask processing to the class specified by the property. 此标准的提供程序支持所有 Unicode 字符代理项除外，垂直组合字符;但是，属性可以用于将输入限制为字符集 a 到 z、 A-Z 和 0-9。This standard provider supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters; however, the property can be used to restrict input to the characters sets a-z, A-Z, and 0-9. 掩码并不一定能保证用户的输入将表示对于给定的类型; 有效的值例如，-9 可以输入的年龄的年数。Masks do not necessarily guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type; for example, -9 could be entered for an age in years. 你可以验证用户的输入将分配到的值的类型的实例表示的有效值属性。You can verify that a user's input represents a valid value by assigning an instance of that value's type to the property. 你可以检测用户是否删除重心能够摆脱时进行监视以包含无效值事件。You can detect whether the user removes focus from when it contains an invalid value by monitoring for the event. 如果类型验证成功，表示值的对象将是可通过属性的参数。If type validation succeeds, the object representing the value will be available through the property of the parameter. 如同控件，不能使用几个常见键盘快捷方式。As with the control, several common keyboard shortcuts do not work with . 具体而言，CTRL-R （右对齐文本），CTRL-L （左对齐文本），和 CTRL-L （中心文本） 不起任何作用。In particular, CTRL-R (right justify text), CTRL-L (left justify text), and CTRL-L (center text) have no effect. ## 使用 Visual Basic 6.0 的兼容性Compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0 旨在保留大多数 Visual Basic 6.0 中的 Masked Edit 控件的功能。 was designed to retain most of the functionality of the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0. 下表列出 Masked Edit 控件上的公共属性，并提供了有关在它们的等效项。The following table lists common properties on the Masked Edit control and gives their equivalents on . |掩码的编辑控件 (Visual Basic 6.0) 属性Masked Edit control (Visual Basic 6.0) property|等效 MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) 属性Equivalent MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) property| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`AllowPrompt` 属性`AllowPrompt` property|| |`AutoTab` 属性`AutoTab` property|无None| |`ClipMode` 属性`ClipMode` property|| |`ClipText` 属性`ClipText` property| (当设置为) (when is set to )| |`Format` 属性`Format` property|无None| |`FormattedText` 属性`FormattedText` property| (当设置为) (when is set to )| |`Mask` 属性`Mask` property|| |`PromptChar` 属性`PromptChar` property|| |`PromptInclude` 属性`PromptInclude` property|| |`ValidationError` 事件`ValidationError` event|| > [!CAUTION] > 控件不支持多行配置或撤消功能。The control does not support multiline configuration or undo functionality. 但是，与这些功能相关联的成员时保留与的兼容性基类，其实现不执行任何操作。However, while the members associated with these features have been retained for compatibility with the base class, their implementations perform no actions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化接受一个日期，并使用这两个和无效的输入向用户发出警报的事件。The following code example initializes the to accept a date, and uses both the and events to alert the user to invalid input. [!code-csharp[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MaskInputRejectedSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MaskInputRejectedSample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `maskedTextProvider`参数定义使用的屏蔽语言。The `maskedTextProvider` parameter defines the masking language used by . 它负责分析掩码，并确定用户输入是否符合当前的掩码位置。It is responsible for parsing the mask and determining whether user input conforms to the current mask position. 可以派生新类从定义您自己的自定义掩码语言，并使用构造函数替换标准。You can derive a new class from to define your own custom masking language, and use the constructor to replace the standard . 如果你想要使用默认的掩码语言，并提供你自己输入的掩码，则不需要使用此构造函数。If you want to use the default masking language and supply your own input mask, you do not need to use this constructor. 相反，您可以使用构造函数或使用默认构造函数，然后将设置属性。Instead, you can either use the constructor, or use the default constructor then set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使是`true`，才能被接受的提示字符必须是有效的掩码中的当前位置。Even when is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted. 例如，如果是"\*"，并且当前掩码中的位置需要用户输入一个数字，输入一个星号 (\*) 将失败并导致事件的发生。For example, if is "\*", and the current location in the mask demands the user enter a digit, entering an asterisk (\*) will fail and cause the event to occur. 属性优先于。The property takes precedence over .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定文本中的所选控件，它是复制到剪贴板或通过检索时解释属性。The property determines how text, selected within the control, is interpreted when it is copied to the clipboard or retrieved through the property. 具体而言，它确定原义字符、 提示字符，或两者是否包括访问所选的文本时。Specifically, it determines whether literal characters, prompt characters, or both are included when selected text is accessed. 如果提示字符被排除，它们将转换为复制的字符串中的空格。When prompt characters are excluded, they are transformed into spaces in the copied string. > [!NOTE] > 属性如何方面的类似用途解释属性。The property serves a similar purpose with respect to how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制字符插入行为的控件。The property controls the character insertion behavior of the control. 此属性的状态由定义枚举，可以始终是开，始终关闭，或者设置为依据的用户的键盘设置。The state of this property is defined by the enumeration, which can be always on, always off or set to respect the setting of the user's keyboard. 此属性取代了键盘的插入模式。This property supersedes the insertion mode of the keyboard. 例如，如果键盘设置为覆盖，但设置为`Insert`，则将在插入模式下操作。For example, if the keyboard is set to overwrite, but is set to `Insert`, the will operate in insert mode. 属性将访问的实际插入模式。The property will access the true insertion mode of the . 如果更改的值更改，将引发事件。If changing changes the value of , will raise the event. 如果尚未设置任何掩码，则此属性无效。This property has no effect if no mask has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的默认属性类。 is the default property for the class. 必须字符串组成的一个或多个掩码元素中下, 表中所示。 must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements, as shown in the following table. 使用的屏蔽语言定义由其关联。The masking language used by is defined by its associated . 标准提供程序指定基于使用的 Visual Basic 6.0 中 Masked Edit 控件的掩码语言，并且应该非常熟悉该平台中迁移的用户。The standard provider specifies a masking language based upon the one used by the Masked Edit control in Visual Basic 6.0, and should be very familiar to users migrating from that platform. |屏蔽元素Masking element|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |00|所需数字。Digit, required. 此元素将接受 0 到 9 之间的任何单个数字。This element will accept any single digit between 0 and 9.| |99|数字或空格，可选。Digit or space, optional.| |#|数字或空格，可选。Digit or space, optional. 如果此位置为空掩码中，它将呈现为一个空格属性。If this position is blank in the mask, it will be rendered as a space in the property. 加号 （+） 和减号 （-） 允许符号。Plus (+) and minus (-) signs are allowed.| |LL|字母，所需。Letter, required. 将输入限制为 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素是等效于 [-zA-Z] 正则表达式中。This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z] in regular expressions.| |??|字母，可选。Letter, optional. 将输入限制为 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素是等效于 [-zA-Z]？This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z]? 在正则表达式。in regular expressions.| |&|字符，则需要。Character, required. 如果属性设置为 true，此元素的行为方式类似的"L"元素。If the property is set to true, this element behaves like the "L" element.| |CC|字符 (可选）。Character, optional. 任何非控制字符。Any non-control character. 如果属性设置为`true`，此元素的行为类似于"？"元素。If the property is set to `true`, this element behaves like the "?" element.| |包含当前请求的 URL 的A|字母数字、 要求。Alphanumeric, required. 如果属性设置为`true`，它将接受的唯一字符是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素的行为类似于"a"元素。This mask element behaves like the "a" element.| |aa|字母数字、 可选。Alphanumeric, optional. 如果属性设置为`true`，它将接受的唯一字符是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 和 A-Z。If the property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z. 此掩码元素的行为类似于"A"元素。This mask element behaves like the "A" element.| |..|小数点占位符。Decimal placeholder. 使用的实际显示字符将适合于格式提供程序的十进制符号由控件的属性。The actual display character used will be the decimal symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |,,|数千个占位符。Thousands placeholder. 使用的实际显示字符将数千个适合的格式提供程序，由该控件的占位符属性。The actual display character used will be the thousands placeholder appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |::|时间分隔符。Time separator. 使用的实际显示字符将适合于格式提供程序的时间符号由控件的属性。The actual display character used will be the time symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |/|日期分隔符。Date separator. 使用的实际显示字符将适合于格式提供程序的日期符号由控件的属性。The actual display character used will be the date symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |$|货币符号。Currency symbol. 显示的实际字符将适合于格式提供程序的货币符号由控件的属性。The actual character displayed will be the currency symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's property.| |\<|转换为小写。Shift down. 将转换为小写后面的所有字符。Converts all characters that follow to lowercase.| |>|转换为大写。Shift up. 将转换为大写后面的所有字符。Converts all characters that follow to uppercase.| ||||禁用以前 shift 向上或向下移动。Disable a previous shift up or shift down.| |\\|转义。Escape. 掩码字符，将其转换为文本进行转义。Escapes a mask character, turning it into a literal. "\\\\"是一个反斜杠的转义序列。"\\\\" is the escape sequence for a backslash.| |所有其他字符All other characters|原义字符。Literals. 所有非掩码元素将显示为本身内。All non-mask elements will appear as themselves within . 文本始终在运行时，占用掩码中的静态位置和不能移动或删除用户。Literals always occupy a static position in the mask at run time, and cannot be moved or deleted by the user.| 如果更改一个掩码，当已包含用户输入上一个掩码，通过筛选将尝试迁移到新的掩码定义该输入。If you change a mask when already contains user input filtered by a previous mask, will attempt to migrate that input into the new mask definition. 如果失败，它将清除现有输入。If it fails, it will clear the existing input. 分配零长度字符串作为掩码将保留在控件中的任何现有数据。Assigning a zero-length string as the mask will preserve any existing data in the control. 使用长度为零的屏蔽，使用时的行为方式类似的单行控件。When used with a zero-length mask, behaves like a single-line control. 小数点 （.）、 千分之几秒 （，）、 时间 （:）、 （/）、 日期和货币 （$） 符号默认为显示这些符号定义的应用程序的区域性。The decimal (.), thousandths (,), time (:), date (/), and currency ($) symbols default to displaying those symbols as defined by the application's culture. 还可以强制使用显示另一个区域性的符号属性。You can force them to display symbols for another culture by using the property. 在运行时的字符插入到掩码受属性。Character insertion into the mask at run time is controlled by the property. 用户可以浏览使用左和向右箭头键或鼠标光标的掩码，并可以跳过掩码中的可选位置输入一个空格。Users can navigate through the mask by using the left and right arrow keys or the mouse cursor, and can skip optional positions in the mask by entering a space. > [!IMPORTANT] > 支持的代理项除外的所有 Unicode 字符和垂直组合的字符。 supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters. 下表显示了示例掩码。The following table shows example masks. |掩码Mask|行为Behavior| |----------|--------------| |`00/00/0000`|国际日期格式的日期 （天、 月份、 年）。A date (day, numeric month, year) in international date format. "/"字符是一个逻辑日期分隔符，并将向用户显示为适用于应用程序的当前区域性的日期分隔符。The "/" character is a logical date separator, and will appear to the user as the date separator appropriate to the application's current culture.| |`00->L在其中三个字母的月份缩写大写首字母后跟两个小写字母与美国格式的日期 （日、 月缩写和年）。A date (day, month abbreviation, and year) in United States format in which the three-letter month abbreviation is displayed with an initial uppercase letter followed by two lowercase letters.| |`(999)-000-0000`|美国电话号码，可选的区域代码。United States phone number, area code optional. 如果不希望用户输入的可选字符，它们可输入空格，或将鼠标指针放直接由第一个 0 表示掩码中的位置。If users do not want to enter the optional characters, they can either enter spaces or place the mouse pointer directly at the position in the mask represented by the first 0.| |`$999,999.00`|0 到 999999 的范围中的货币值。A currency value in the range of 0 to 999999. 货币、 千分位的十进制字符将替换和在运行时与它们特定于区域性的等效项。The currency, thousandth, and decimal characters will be replaced at run time with their culture-specific equivalents.|

summary.span: 当用户的输入或者分配的字符与输入掩码的对应格式元素不匹配时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user's input or assigned character does not match the corresponding format element of the input mask.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的默认事件类。 is the default event for the class. 输入掩码字符被拒绝时发生事件。The event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask. 输入的掩码，由属性，通过与该控件关联的掩码的文本框提供程序来进行解释属性。The input mask, represented by the property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the property. 在以下情况下将引发： is raised in the following situations: - 输入的字符不匹配的对应格式元素。An input character does not match the corresponding format element. 例如，用户输入的字母型字符需要一个数字时。For example, the user enters an alphabetic character when a digit is required. 这可能是为什么将引发此事件的最常见原因。This is probably the most common reason why this event is raised. - 用户尝试输入掩码的末尾之外的无关字符是因为已填充掩码或当前插入符号位置已移动到末尾处显示的输入的掩码字符串。The user is trying to input extraneous characters beyond the end of the mask either because the mask has already been filled or the current caret position has been moved to the very end of the displayed input mask string. - 粘贴操作可以插入与它关联的格式的元素，不匹配的字符或者如果属性是`false`，它将现有字符移动到新位置，它们不匹配其格式元素。A paste operation either inserts a character that does not match its associated format element, or if the property is `false`, it shifts existing characters into new positions where they do not match their format elements. - 剪切的操作会将现有字符移动到左侧，和一个或多个字符与它们的新关联的格式元素不匹配。A cut operation shifts existing characters to the left, and one or more characters do not match their newly associated format elements. - 为进行了赋值导致一个或多个掩码冲突的属性和分配的字符串。An assignment was made to the property and the assigned string caused one or more mask violations. 一个字符串被赋予会导致该控件发生，该字符串的任何部分将出现在。If a string was assigned to the control that causes to occur, no part of the string will appear in . 处理默认将播放提示音声音 if属性设置为`true`。The default handling for will play a beep sound if the property is set to `true`. 实现自定义错误处理，例如，如果掩码已满，将移动到下一步的用户输入控件或显示自定义错误对话框或工具提示，如果输入的字符无效，通常处理此事件。This event is often handled to implement custom error handling, for example, to move to the next user input control if the mask is full, or to display a custom error dialog box or ToolTip if the input character is invalid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MaskedTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MaskedTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于敏感用户输入，它是常见的做法，若要隐藏用户输入的实际信息。For sensitive user input, it is common practice to conceal the actual information entered by the user. 如果属性设置为非 null 字符，将显示在控件的所有输入此字符。If the property is set to a non-null character, will display this character for all input into the control. 此属性设置为`null`将禁用此功能。Setting this property to `null` will disable this functionality. 如果你想要使用在 COMCTL32.dll，使用中定义的操作系统提供密码字符属性改为。If you want to use the operating system supplied password character, which is defined in COMCTL32.dll, use the property instead. 如果这两个和激活属性，后者将优先。If both the and properties are activated, the latter takes precedence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 作为一种安全措施，控件禁用对受密码保护的字符串的剪切和复制操作。As a security consideration, the control disables cut and copy operations on password-protected strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写其基控件的实现的若要正确处理时用户正在输入字符的字符事件如使用输入法编辑器 (IME) 用于日语、 中文和其他复杂的非拉丁语脚本输入。 overrides its base control's implementation of to properly handle character events when the user is entering characters using an Input Method Editor (IME), such as is used for entering Japanese, Chinese, and other complex non-Latin scripts. 检测到它接收 WM_IME_CHAR 消息并禁止显示它们以防止该控件中显示这些字符后会发生任何 WM_CHAR 消息。 detects any WM_CHAR messages that occur after it receives a WM_IME_CHAR message and suppresses them in order to prevent these characters from showing up in the control. 如果您从该控件派生，并重写此消息，应复制此行为，如果你想在新的控件以使用 Ime。If you derive from this control and override this message, you should duplicate this behavior if you wish your new control to work with IMEs.

value.span: 如果输入字符串的处理应当在首次出现分析错误时终止，该值为 ；如果处理应忽略所有错误，则为 。

span.span: if processing of the input string should be terminated at the first parsing error; otherwise, if processing should ignore all errors.

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时用户会输入到多个字符在单一的输入操作中，通常通过复制并粘贴字符串。Sometimes the user will enter several characters into a in a single input operation, typically by copying and pasting a string. 如果整个字符串仅包含有效字符，根据输入掩码中的粘贴位置整个操作将成功。If the entire string only contains valid characters, according to their paste position in the input mask, then the entire operation will succeed. 但是，在分析时出错的行为上的值取决于，按如下所示：However, when a parsing error occurs, the behavior of depends on the value of , as follows: - 如果此属性为`true`，然后处理输入字符串的无效字符处停止。If this property is `true`, then processing of the input string stops at the invalid character. 将忽略所有后续字符。All subsequent characters are ignored. 单个引发事件。A single event is raised. - 如果此属性为`false`，然后将拒绝无效的字符，但继续分析输入字符串中的下一个字符。If this property is `false`, then the invalid character is rejected, but parsing continues with the next character in the input string. 一个事件引发的输入字符串中的每个无效字符。A event is raised for every invalid character in the input string. ，和属性也会影响用户输入的解释。The , and properties can also influence the interpretation of the user input. 如果属性是`false`，则已在插入点右侧输入掩码中的任何字符将取代通过接受的字符数。If the property is `false`, then any characters already in the input mask to the right of the insertion point will be displaced by the accepted number of characters. 此转换可能会导致额外的分析错误。This shifting may cause additional parsing errors. 粘贴操作可以通过设置以编程方式模拟属性。A pasting operation can be mimicked programmatically by setting the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理与提示字符匹配的输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.

value.span: 如果输入的提示字符会导致掩码中的当前可编辑位置被重置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将提示字符作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以专门处理两种类别的字符 （空格和提示字符）。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 通常情况下，将对照掩码，并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假设属性设置到非`null`，然后设置属性设置为`true`将导致对提示字符的特殊处理。Assuming that the property is set to non-`null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 如果用户输入到掩码的提示字符，这会导致当前的掩码字符位置要清除和当前位置前移到下一个可编辑字符。When the user enters the prompt character into the mask, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 将优先于属性下, 表中所示。 takes precedence over the property, as shown in the following table. |ResetOnPrompt 值ResetOnPrompt value|AllowPromptAsInput 值AllowPromptAsInput value|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |-------------------------|------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|输入提示字符，并且它会导致当前的掩码位置，要重置。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 这是默认设置。This is the default.| |`true`|`false`|输入提示字符，并且它会导致当前的掩码位置，要重置。The prompt character can be entered and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|作为标准的输入字符进行处理的提示字符。The prompt character is processed as a standard input character.| |`false`|`false`|提示字符无效，将引发事件。The prompt character is not valid and raises a event.|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理空白输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how a space input character should be handled.

value.span: 如果空白输入字符将导致重置掩码中的当前可编辑位置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将其作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the space input character causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that it is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以专门处理两种类别的字符 （空格和提示字符）。The can treat two categories of characters - spaces and prompt characters - specially. 通常情况下，将对照掩码，并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。Typically, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 设置属性设置为`true`将导致当前的掩码字符位置要清除和当前位置前移到下一个可编辑字符。Setting the property to `true` will result in the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 字符输入的类型将决定是否屏蔽引擎前移到下一个字符在掩码中，或保留当前的位置中，等待匹配的字符。The type of character input will determine whether the masking engine moves forward to the next character in the mask, or stays at the current position and waits for a matching character. 如果输入的字符是空格，并且与掩码中的当前非可编辑字符不匹配，屏蔽引擎将向前跳至下一个字符在掩码中。If the input character is a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will skip ahead to the next character in the mask. 如果输入的字符不是一个空格，并且与掩码中的当前非可编辑字符不匹配，则屏蔽引擎将保留在当前的掩码位置，并尝试对其下一步的输入的字符进行匹配。If the input character is not a space, and does not match the current non-editable character in the mask, the masking engine will remain at the current mask position, and attempt to match the next input character against it.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户重新输入原义字符值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to reenter literal values.

value.span: 允许重新输入原义字符；否则 阻止用户覆盖原义字符。

span.span: to allow literals to be reentered; otherwise, to prevent the user from overwriting literal characters.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的掩码通常包含原义字符。Input masks commonly contain literals. 当用户输入字符到在运行时，当前字符位置有时会落在文字。When the user enters characters into the at runtime, the current character position will sometimes fall on a literal. 属性描述的下一个字符的用户输入的方式进行处理，按如下所示：The property describes how user input for the next character is to be handled, as follows: - 如果此属性为`true`，用户可以重复输入相同的字符与当前的位置，该文本，或者可以输入的下一个可编辑字符，从而从当前位置跳至该位置。If this property is `true`, the user can either redundantly enter the same character as the literal at the current position, or can enter the next editable character, thereby jumping the current position to that position. - 如果此属性为`false`，用户可以只输入下一个可编辑字符。If this property is `false`, the user can only enter the next editable character. 如果掩码中的下一个位置将不接受对文本字符 (例如，用户类型"/"和下一个位置仅接受数字)，则控件将引发事件。If the next position in the mask will not accept the literal character (for example, the user types "/" and the next position only accepts digits), the control will raise the event. 例如，在"90/90/0000"日期输入掩码中，正斜杠字符都是文本。As an example, in the "90/90/0000" date entry mask, the forward slash characters are literals. 假定用户输入两个数字，"11"、 掩码的当前位置位于第一个正斜杠 （/） 原义字符。Assume that the user has entered two initial digits, "11", so the current position in the mask is at the first forward slash (/) literal. 如果是`true`，那么用户具有以下选择：If is `true`, then the user has the following valid choices: - 用户可以输入"/"字符。The user can enter a "/" character. 这会导致移动到下一个字符，这在此示例中是第四个位置，以 9 屏蔽元素的位置。This results in the position being moved to the next character, which in this example is the fourth position, a 9 masking element. - 用户可以输入下一个可编辑字符，这在此示例中是一个数字。The user can enter the next editable character, which in this example is a digit. 该数字将通过验证，当前的位置会自动移到第五个位置，即 0 屏蔽元素。The digit would be validated and the current position would automatically be moved to the fifth position, which is a 0 masking element. 如果是`false`，然后允许仅有效的数据输入，这在此示例中将会是一个数字。If is `false`, then only a valid data input is allowed, which in this example would be a digit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件 （可选） 验证用户输入是否针对定义的类型及其属性。The control will optionally validate user input against the type defined by its property. 当此属性不是`null`，发生以下一系列事件：When this property is not `null`, the following series of events occurs: 1. 验证序列开始时出现以下情况之一：The validation sequence begins when one of the following occurs: - 控件失去焦点。 control looses focus. - 检索属性。The property is retrieved. - 调用 方法。The method is called. 2. 任何这些事件会导致调用`Parse`与指定的类型的方法属性。Any of these events result in a call to the `Parse` method of the type specified with the property. `Parse` 负责进行格式化的输入字符串转换为目标类型。`Parse` is responsible for the conversion of the formatted input string to the target type. 成功转换相当于验证成功。A successful conversion equates to a successful validation. 3. 之后`Parse`返回，引发事件。After `Parse` returns, the event is raised. 此事件的事件处理程序最常实现来执行类型或掩码验证处理。The event handler for this event is most commonly implemented to perform type or mask validation processing. 它接收参数，其中包含信息有关的转换; 例如，成员指示转换是否成功。It receives a parameter containing information about the conversion; for example, the member indicates whether the conversion was successful. 4. 之后的事件处理程序事件返回，标准验证事件， ，将引发。After the event handler for the event returns, the standard validation event, , is raised. 可以实现一个处理程序以执行标准验证，可能包括取消该事件。A handler can be implemented to perform standard validation, perhaps including canceling the event. 5. 如果未在步骤 3 中取消事件，则标准控件的验证事件引发。If the event is not canceled in step 3, the standard control validation event is raised. 如果属性设置为`true`中事件处理程序，该事件将被取消并控件保留焦点，除非后续事件设置其版本属性返回到`false`。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the event will be canceled and the control retains focus, unless the subsequent event sets its version of the property back to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试分析为一个有效的用户的输入对象。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid object. 如果失败，事件处理程序为用户显示一条错误消息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值为有效，该代码验证所提供的日期不早于今天的日期。If the value is a valid , the code verifies that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此代码示例需要在 Windows 窗体项目，包含名为控件`MaskedTextBox1`和一个控件命名为`ToolTip1`。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 掩码并在本身不能保证用户的输入将表示给定类型的有效值。Masks do not in themselves guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type. 下面的 C# 代码显示了一个掩码：The following C# code shows a mask: ``` maskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"; ``` 下面的 Visual Basic 代码显示了一个掩码：The following Visual Basic code shows a mask: `MaskedTextBox1.Mask = "99/99/9999"` 此掩码可以要求用户输入八位数字，但无法验证用户输入月份、 日期和年份值在正常范围内;掩码而言，"2003 年 12 月 20 日"和"70/90/0000"都同样有效。This mask can demand that the user enter eight digits, but cannot verify that the user enters month, date, and year values in the correct range; "12/20/2003" and "70/90/0000" are equally valid as far as the mask is concerned. 可以使用若要验证是否由用户输入的数据处于正确范围内的在前面提到的情况下，通过将其分配的实例类型。You can use to verify whether the data entered by the user falls within the correct range - in the previously mentioned case, by assigning it an instance of the type. 控件中的当前文本将是当用户离开控件时，请验证。The current text in the control will be validated either when the user leaves the control. 您可以确定是否没有数据的验证失败进行监视以事件。You can determine whether or not the data fails validation by monitoring for the event. 将仅对其执行检查如果是`true`。 will only perform the check against if is `true`. 如果想要使用自己的自定义数据类型与，则必须实现一个静态`Parse`采用字符串作为参数的方法。If you want to use your own custom data types with , you must implement a static `Parse` method that takes a string as a parameter. 此方法必须与一个或两个以下签名实现：This method must be implemented with one or both of the following signatures: `public static Object Parse(string)` `public static Object Parse(string, IFormatProvider)` ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试分析为一个有效的用户的输入。The following code example attempts to parse the user's input as a valid . 如果失败，事件处理程序为用户显示一条错误消息。If it fails, the event handler displays an error message to the user. 如果值为有效，代码执行其他检查以确保所提供的日期不早于今天的日期。If the value is a valid , the code performs an additional check to ensure that the date supplied is not prior to today's date. 此代码示例需要在 Windows 窗体项目，包含名为控件`MaskedTextBox1`和一个控件命名为`ToolTip1`。This code example requires that your Windows Forms project contains a control named `MaskedTextBox1` and a control named `ToolTip1`.
